pages.text: This curse will save you from negative effects and save you even from death $(l)a short while$().$(br)This curse will kill you when it is removed, you can extend the curse by drinking more unicorn blood, or rid of it by being resurrected, like with a $(br2)$(l)Totem of Undying$(), $(l:bewitchment:poppets/death_protection)Death Protection$() Poppet or $(l:bwplus:rituals/make_effigy)Effigy$()
